info.description: Priority Matrix HIPAA creates a central source of truth to coordinate all the work your team needs to do. Prioritize all your work, share with your team and focus on the high-impact tasks first. Connect now to manage your tasks automatically.
info.title: Priority Matrix HIPAA

parameters.description: Project that contains the desired item
parameters.name: Project
parameters.x-ms-summary: What project contains the item you want to comment on?

text.description: What do you want to say in your comment?
text.title: Text

resource_uri.description: URI that points to this resource in our API
resource_uri.title: ResourceURI

timestamp.description: When the comment happened, given in seconds since 1970
timestamp.title: Timestamp

allDay.description: True if the item has a due date and it's supposed to last a full day
allDay.title: All Day

boxFolderID.description: Use this field to store an ID or URI for this object in another system
boxFolderID.title: External Id

completionPercentage.description: Percentage of this task that is completed, ranging from 0 to 100
completionPercentage.title: Completion Percentage

delegated_by_username.description: Who delegated the item the last time
delegated_by_username.title: Delegated by User

descriptionText.description: Notes for the item, with an extended description of the task at hand
descriptionText.title: Notes

followers.description: List of followers for the item

macResourceURL.description: A link to a relevant resource relevant (a website, another item, a project...)
macResourceURL.title: Link

owner_username.description: Who is responsible for this item?
owner_username.title: Owned by User

projects.description: List of projects which contain the item (typically a single project)

quadrant.description: Quadrant choice, left to right and top to bottom
quadrant.title: Quadrant

get.description: Gets all the projects that the user can access

parameters.description: Number of projects to be returned
parameters.name: limit
parameters.x-ms-summary: The maximum number of projects to be returned at once

parameters.name: state
parameters.x-ms-summary: Pass state=0 for undeleted projects, or 2/3 for trashed/deleted projects

parameters.description: Skip projects that contain this tag
parameters.name: skip_tag
parameters.x-ms-summary: For example, skip_tag=archived skips all archived projects

boxFolderID.description: Use this field to store an ID or URI for this object in another system
boxFolderID.title: External Id

is_team_project.description: True if the project is shared with all team members
